sentences.sContent: The area is under banana cultivation.
The banana bears two crops every year.
sentences.sContent_eng: The banana bears two crops every year.

sentences.sContent: He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.sContent_eng: He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.sCn: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

synos.tran: [园艺]香蕉；喜剧演员；大鹰钩鼻

phrases.pCn: 主要滑稽演员，引申为最好的演员或重要的官员；主要人物
香蕉圣代（剖开香蕉夹以冰淇淋等）；香蕉半剖条
n. 香蕉共和国（指中、南美洲发展中国家）

remMethod.val: “剥拿了”→剥完香蕉皮， 拿着吃→香蕉

trans.tranOther: a long curved tropical fruit with a yellow skin
